definitions.definition: Respectful of privacy or secrecy ; exercising caution in order to avoid causing embarrassment ; quiet ; diplomatic .
examples: With a discreet gesture, she reminded him to mind his manners.
John just doesn't understand that laughing at Mary all day is not very discreet .

definitions.definition: Not drawing attention , anger or challenge ; inconspicuous .

main_definition: Respectful of privacy or secrecy ; exercising caution in order to avoid causing embarrassment ; quiet ; diplomatic .
secondary_definitions: Not drawing attention , anger or challenge ; inconspicuous .
